e: ￹`I~ `faloco'~ `ako~ `ko~ `tangic~ `ako~.￺My grief is in my heart (not expressed).￻我內心在悲泣
￹`Tangic~ `aka~ `ka~ `haen~ `i~ `ka'ayaw~ `no~ `'aloman~`ay~.￺Don't cry in front of everyone.￻不要在眾人面前哭泣
￹`Tanotangic~ `sa~`~ `ci~`~ `Tafiti~ `a~ `ma~`cokacok~.￺David wept as he went up hill.￻大衛一直哭著爬山
￹`Aka~ `pa~`tangic~`en~ `kako~.￺Don't beseech / try to force me.￻不要勉強我
